name: Adow
description:
[ Press F11 to play in Full Screen ]

Here is my game made for the Ludum Dare 44
With the theme "Your life is currency" (theme I haven't fully respected since I didn't find any good idea from it ^^')

I made this Game jam alone, in 48 hours, with the intention of making a finished and fun game, something I've never been able to realize in any of my time-limited projects. So here it goes. I hope I achieved my goal

Don't hesitate to tell me if you found any bug, or if you have any recommandation ... or anything about the game, anything you'll say will be something constructive, and so, enjoyable :)
